name: Delirium: Chapter Zero
description:
In the dead of night you wake up in a cold sweat... Something is wrong... Even though your surroundings are familiar you cannot shake this feeling of dread...

Delirium is a proof of concept for a game I've been wanting to make for a little while finally put into action. This version of the game is a short story about Diego, the protagonist, as he is confronted by the gaps in his memory and the loss of his right eye in the form of a dream. My goal is to try to create a more full and fleshed out game about him and his world as I continue to practice and learn about game development. This was my first shot at it and I'd love to hear any feedback anyone has about it.

Credits

Story: Card.Mythos

Art: Card.Mythos

Programing: Card.Mythos

Music: Brio!

Made with Bitsy
